note:
Resident swamp hag at Conranimal Wilderness Sanctuary (micro-community working to transform individualism, violence and associated constructs).  Committed to investing all available capacity into nonviolence, decolonial futures, rewilding, degrowth, mutual aid, gift-based economy, mutual mothering, resilience, sustainability and nourishing joy for all (human and non).  

#nobridge
